ItemConsumable.name: Your homemade milk
ItemConsumable.description: A large bottle of fresh rich milk made by your own breasts. All the most useful that is left of your victim is concentrated in this certanly delicious liquid.
ItemConsumable.effectrecover: Trying not to miss a drop of this thick tasty milk, you hungrily swallows all the liquid without a trace. Finishing your meal with a heartily burp and pat on the stomach.
